# registerFilterName(_:)

**Instance Method**

Registers the name associated with a filter chain.

## Declaration

```swift
func registerFilterName(_ name: String)
```

## Parameters

- **name**: A unique name for the filter chain you want to register.

## Discussion

This method allows you to register the filter chain as a named filter in the Core Image filter repository. You can then create a `CIFilter` object from it using the the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class/init(name:)] method of the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] class.
